org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.util

Annotation Type FilterDefinition


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface FilterDefinition
    This class is used for exposing filters using the rest of the properties

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] columns
      Link this filter to a list of columns.
      FilterComponentType[] componentType
      Specified where this filter can be used.
      FilterDataType dataType
      Specified the data type of the filter (text|date)
      FilterFieldType fieldType
      Specified the type of the filter
      boolean multiple
      Specifies if multiple values can be selected for a filter
      FilterReportType reportType
      Specified the report type where the filter is visible (D|P|ALL)
      java.lang.String tab
      In which tab to display this filter.
      boolean ui
      Whenever to display this filter in UI.
      java.lang.String visibilityCheck
      Method name in same class to be called to determine visibility of this method.

    • Element Detail

      • ui

        public abstract boolean ui
        Whenever to display this filter in UI.
        Default:
        true

      • columns

        public abstract java.lang.String[] columns
        Link this filter to a list of columns.
        Default:
        "N/A"

      • fieldType

        public abstract FilterFieldType fieldType
        Specified the type of the filter
        Default:
        org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.util.FilterFieldType.TREE

      • dataType

        public abstract FilterDataType dataType
        Specified the data type of the filter (text|date)
        Default:
        org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.util.FilterDataType.TEXT

      • componentType

        public abstract FilterComponentType[] componentType
        Specified where this filter can be used.
        Default:
        org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.util.FilterComponentType.ALL

      • reportType

        public abstract FilterReportType reportType
        Specified the report type where the filter is visible (D|P|ALL)
        Default:
        org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.util.FilterReportType.DONOR

      • tab

        public abstract java.lang.String tab
        In which tab to display this filter.
        Default:
        "Unassigned"

      • visibilityCheck

        public abstract java.lang.String visibilityCheck
        Method name in same class to be called to determine visibility of this method. The signature must be: public boolean methodName()
        Default:
        ""

      • multiple

        public abstract boolean multiple
        Specifies if multiple values can be selected for a filter
        Default:
        true
